title: The Dawn of motoring
creator_credit: Bill Mason, John Wiles, British Petroleum and Films of Today
brief_description: Part one of a 6-part series “History of the motor car”. Covers the development of the motorcar from the invention of the wheel to 1895 when the first cars produced in commercial quantities appeared on the roads.
creator_credit_for_label: Bill Mason, John Wiles, British Petroleum and Films of Today
